name: Arc Dragon of Creation Divine Dragoon
text:
6 or more Dragoon Monsters with different names
This monster must be Fusion Summoned with the above materials using "Dragoon Fusion" and cannot be Fusion Summoned by other ways. This card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn, during either player's turn, you can discard a card; If you do, your opponent's Main Phase is skipped. This card gains ATK and DEF equal to the number of "Omni" monsters in the GY or banished x1000. You cannot control any other monsters if you have this monster on the field. Once per duel, during your turn, you can discard your hand and the top 10 cards of your deck; if you do, you can destroy all other cards on the field and in your opponent's hand. Once per duel, you can send all cards in your Extra Deck to the GY; If you do, draw a card for each card sent to the GY by this effect. If this card on the field is under its owner's control, your opponent cannot use the effects of cards that would inflict damage to your Life Points.
